Package imagingbook.violajones.lib

Class FeatureNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeatureNode
  • public class FeatureNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Haar feature, usually composed of multiple rectangular patches (of type FeaturePatch). Instances of this class make the nodes of a FeatureTree.

      • eval

        public int eval​(imagingbook.lib.image.IntegralImage II,
                int u,
                int v,
                double scale)
        Evaluates this feature node by applying its rectangular patches. Returns the branching direction (LEFT or RIGHT), depending on how the normalized patch sum compares to the threshold.
        Parameters:
        II - input image (as an integral image)
        u - left position of the candidate subimage
        v - top position of the candidate subimage
        scale - the current scale to be applied
        Returns:
        The branching direction (LEFT or RIGHT).

        public void print​(int featureCnt)
